biography.content:
Fifteen years of experience in the field of Geotechnical Engineering, implementing both academic knowledge and practical field and design experience. Currently appointed by one of the top Egyptian universities as an Assistant Professor (on sabbatical), and by an international consulting firm as a Senior Geotechnical Engineer. More details about my publications can be found at
http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=159754836&trk=nav_responsive_tab_profile
AND
http://scholar.google.com/citations?user=lEwSxjkAAAAJ&hl=en

keyword.content: Slow moving slides, Little Chief Slide, Damage from slow moving slides, fiber-reinforced soil, braced excavation under seismic conditions
